entry.summary: Adapts structural complexity analysis to 3D brain MRI, finding systematic decrease in structural complexity with age using sliding-window coarse-graining scheme.

entry.title: Fluxamba: Topology-Aware Anisotropic State Space Models for Geological Lineament Segmentation in Multi-Source Remote Sensing

author.name: Jin Bai, Huiyao Zhang, Qi Wen, Shengyang Li, Xiaolin Tian, Atta ur Rahman

entry.summary: Proposes Fluxamba for geological lineament segmentation using topology-aware feature rectification with Structural Flux Block for anisotropic information flow, addressing SSM limitations for curvilinear targets.

entry.title: Learning with Geometric Priors in U-Net Variants for Polyp Segmentation

author.name: Fabian Vazquez, Jose A. Nu\~nez, Diego Adame, Alissen Moreno, Augustin Zhan, Huimin Li, Jinghao Yang, Haoteng Tang, Bin Fu, Pengfei Gu

entry.summary: Proposes Geometric Prior-guided Module (GPM) injecting explicit geometric priors into U-Net variants for polyp segmentation, using fine-tuned VGGT for depth estimation from colonoscopy images.

entry.title: Revisiting Lightweight Low-Light Image Enhancement: From a YUV Color Space Perspective

author.name: Hailong Yan, Shice Liu, Xiangtao Zhang, Lujian Yao, Fengxiang Yang, Jinwei Chen, Bo Li

entry.summary: Proposes lightweight low-light image enhancement from YUV color space perspective, identifying that Y channel loses low-frequency content while UV channels corrupted by high-frequency noise.

entry.title: SMV-EAR: Bring Spatiotemporal Multi-View Representation Learning into Efficient Event-Based Action Recognition

author.name: Rui Fan, Weidong Hao

entry.summary: Proposes SMV-EAR for efficient event-based action recognition using spatiotemporal multi-view representation with translation-invariant dense conversion and dual-branch dynamic fusion.

entry.title: PhaSR: Generalized Image Shadow Removal with Physically Aligned Priors

author.name: Chia-Ming Lee, Yu-Fan Lin, Yu-Jou Hsiao, Jing-Hui Jung, Yu-Lun Liu, Chih-Chung Hsu

entry.summary: Proposes PhaSR for shadow removal using physically aligned priors with dual-level alignment: Physically Aligned Normalization for illumination correction and Geometric-Semantic Rectification Attention for cross-modal alignment.

entry.title: Frequency-aware Neural Representation for Videos

author.name: Jun Zhu, Xinfeng Zhang, Lv Tang, Junhao Jiang, Gai Zhang, Jia Wang

entry.summary: FaNeRV addresses spectral bias in INR-based video compression by explicitly decoupling low- and high-frequency components through multi-resolution supervision and frequency-aware training strategies.

entry.title: Revisiting 3D Reconstruction Kernels as Low-Pass Filters

author.name: Shengjun Zhang, Min Chen, Yibo Wei, Mingyu Dong, Yueqi Duan

entry.summary: Revisits 3D reconstruction from signal processing perspective, identifying periodic spectral extension from sampling as the fundamental challenge and proposing Jinc kernel for improved low-pass filtering.

entry.title: YOLO-DS: Fine-Grained Feature Decoupling via Dual-Statistic Synergy Operator for Object Detection

author.name: Lin Huang, Yujuan Tan, Weisheng Li, Shitai Shan, Liu Liu, Bo Liu, Linlin Shen, Jing Yu, Yue Niu

entry.summary: YOLO-DS introduces Dual-Statistic Synergy Operator for explicit modeling of heterogeneous object responses within shared feature channels, with lightweight gating modules for channel-wise selection.

entry.title: GimmBO: Interactive Generative Image Model Merging via Bayesian Optimization

author.name: Chenxi Liu, Selena Ling, Alec Jacobson

entry.summary: GimmBO supports interactive exploration of diffusion model adapter merging through Preferential Bayesian Optimization, addressing poor scalability of manual slider-based tuning.

entry.title: Deep Intrinsic Surprise-Regularized Control (DISRC): A Biologically Inspired Mechanism for Efficient Deep Q-Learning in Sparse Environments

author.name: Yash Kini, Shiv Davay, Shreya Polavarapu

entry.summary: Introduces DISRC, a biologically-inspired augmentation to DQN that dynamically scales Q-updates based on latent-space surprise for improved convergence in sparse-reward settings.

entry.title: Global Optimization of Atomic Clusters via Physically-Constrained Tensor Train Decomposition

author.name: Konstantin Sozykin, Nikita Rybin, Andrei Chertkov, Anh-Huy Phan, Ivan Oseledets, Alexander Shapeev, Ivan Novikov, Gleb Ryzhakov

entry.summary: Introduces tensor train decomposition framework for global optimization of atomic clusters, combining TTOpt and PROTES methods with physically-constrained encoding schemes.

entry.title: A Unified Kantorovich Duality for Multimarginal Optimal Transport

author.name: Yehya Cheryala, Mokhtar Z. Alaya, Salim Bouzebda

entry.summary: Presents unified and complete Kantorovich duality theory for multimarginal optimal transport on Polish spaces, extending classical two-marginal conjugacy to multi-marginal setting.

entry.title: Diversified Scaling Inference in Time Series Foundation Models

author.name: Ruijin Hua, Zichuan Liu, Kun Zhang, Yiyuan Yang

entry.summary: Studies inference-time compute scaling in time series foundation models, finding standard sampling fails to follow scaling laws due to insufficient exploration.

entry.title: Motif Diversity in Human Liver ChIP-seq Data Using MAP-Elites

author.name: Alejandro Medina, Mary Lauren Benton

entry.summary: Applies MAP-Elites quality-diversity algorithm to DNA motif discovery, evolving diverse position weight matrix motifs while preserving biologically meaningful dimensions.

entry.title: Error Analysis of Bayesian Inverse Problems with Generative Priors

author.name: Bamdad Hosseini, Ziqi Huang

entry.summary: Presents quantitative error bounds for Bayesian inverse problems with minimum Wasserstein-2 generative model priors, showing posterior error inherits prior's rate.

entry.title: Discovery of Feasible 3D Printing Configurations for Metal Alloys via AI-driven Adaptive Experimental Design

author.name: Azza Fadhel, Nathaniel W. Zuckschwerdt, Aryan Deshwal, Susmita Bose, Amit Bandyopadhyay, Jana Doppa

entry.summary: Applies AI-driven adaptive experimental design with domain knowledge to discover feasible 3D printing configurations for metal alloys, using surrogate models to reduce expensive physical experiments.

entry.title: LLM-Based SQL Generation: Prompting, Self-Refinement, and Adaptive Weighted Majority Voting

author.name: Yu-Jie Yang, Hung-Fu Chang, Po-An Chen

entry.summary: Proposes SSEV pipeline for text-to-SQL combining self-refinement with weighted majority voting without ground-truth data, built on PET-SQL framework.

entry.title: MANGO: A Global Single-Date Paired Dataset for Mangrove Segmentation

author.name: Junhyuk Heo, Beomkyu Choi, Hyunjin Shin, Darongsae Kwon

entry.summary: Introduces MANGO, a large-scale global mangrove segmentation dataset with 42,703 labeled image-mask pairs from Sentinel-2 imagery across 124 countries for environmental monitoring.

entry.title: PhysE-Inv: A Physics-Encoded Inverse Modeling approach for Arctic Snow Depth Prediction

author.name: Akila Sampath, Vandana Janeja, Jianwu Wang

entry.summary: Introduces PhysE-Inv, a framework combining LSTM encoder-decoder with physics-guided contrastive learning for Arctic snow depth prediction under sparse, noisy data conditions.

entry.title: SonoEdit: Null-Space Constrained Knowledge Editing for Pronunciation Correction in LLM-Based TTS

author.name: Ayush Pratap Singh, Harshit Singh, Nityanand Mathur, Akshat Mandloi, Sudarshan Kamath

entry.summary: Introduces SonoEdit for correcting TTS pronunciation errors through null-space editing without retraining. Targets low-resource proper nouns and non-English names.

entry.title: Decentralized Multi-Agent Swarms for Autonomous Grid Security in Industrial IoT: A Consensus-based Approach

author.name: Samaresh Kumar Singh, Joyjit Roy

entry.summary: Proposes decentralized multi-agent swarm (DMAS) architecture with autonomous AI agents at edge gateways functioning as distributed immune system for IIoT network security.

entry.title: ClinNet: Evidential Ordinal Regression with Bilateral Asymmetry and Prototype Memory for Knee Osteoarthritis Grading

author.name: Xiaoyang Li, Runni Zhou

entry.summary: Proposes ClinNet for knee osteoarthritis grading using evidential ordinal regression with bilateral asymmetry encoding and prototype memory for trustworthy diagnosis.

entry.title: NeRF-MIR: Towards High-Quality Restoration of Masked Images with Neural Radiance Fields

author.name: Xianliang Huang, Zhizhou Zhong, Shuhang Chen, Yi Xu, Juhong Guan, Shuigeng Zhou

entry.summary: Introduces NeRF-MIR for masked image restoration using PERE strategy to distribute rays based on patch entropy. Demonstrates NeRF potential for image restoration.

entry.title: ONRW: Optimizing inversion noise for high-quality and robust watermark

author.name: Xuan Ding, Xiu Yan, Chuanlong Xie, Yao Zhu

entry.summary: ONRW proposes diffusion-based watermarking through inversion noise optimization, achieving high quality and robustness to image corruptions.

entry.title: Understanding Users' Privacy Reasoning and Behaviors During Chatbot Use to Support Meaningful Agency in Privacy

author.name: Mohammad Hadi Nezhad, Francisco Enrique Vicente Castro, Ivon Arroyo

entry.summary: Qualitative study examining how computer science students reason about privacy and manage sensitive information during realistic chatbot interactions. Investigates in-the-moment disclosure and protection behaviors.

entry.title: PaperTok: Exploring the Use of Generative AI for Creating Short-form Videos for Research Communication

author.name: Meziah Ruby Cristobal, Hyeonjeong Byeon, Tze-Yu Chen, Ruoxi Shang, Donghoon Shin, Ruican Zhong, Tony Zhou, Gary Hsieh

entry.summary: Presents PaperTok system using generative AI to transform academic papers into short-form video content. Validated through mixed-methods study with 18 researchers and crowdsourced evaluation of 100 participants.

entry.title: Neural Network Approximation: A View from Polytope Decomposition

author.name: ZeYu Li, ShiJun Zhang, TieYong Zeng, FengLei Fan

entry.summary: Investigates universal approximation capabilities of ReLU networks from polytope decomposition perspective, developing kernel polynomial method for approximation characterized by Totik-Ditzian modulus.

entry.title: 3DGesPolicy: Phoneme-Aware Holistic Co-Speech Gesture Generation Based on Action Control

author.name: Xuanmeng Sha, Liyun Zhang, Tomohiro Mashita, Naoya Chiba, Yuki Uranishi

entry.summary: Introduces 3DGesPolicy framework for holistic co-speech gesture generation using diffusion policy from robotics, modeling frame-to-frame variations as unified actions for coherent motion trajectories.

entry.title: Learning temporal embeddings from electronic health records of chronic kidney disease patients

author.name: Aditya Kumar, Mario A. Cypko, Oliver Amft

entry.summary: Investigates whether temporal embedding models trained on longitudinal EHR can learn clinically meaningful representations for chronic kidney disease patients without compromising prediction.

entry.title: Capturing P: On the Expressive Power and Efficient Evaluation of Boolean Retrieval

author.name: Amir Aavani

entry.summary: Argues retrieval engines must support complex nested logic graphs efficiently, analyzing expressiveness and efficiency tradeoffs between Document-at-a-Time and Term-at-a-Time approaches.

entry.title: Multi-Objective Reinforcement Learning for Efficient Tactical Decision Making for Trucks in Highway Traffic

author.name: Deepthi Pathare, Leo Laine, Morteza Haghir Chehreghani

entry.summary: Presents multi-objective RL framework for heavy-duty vehicle tactical decisions, learning continuous Pareto-optimal policies balancing safety, efficiency, and operational costs.

entry.title: RAM-SD: Retrieval-Augmented Multi-agent framework for Sarcasm Detection

author.name: Ziyang Zhou, Ziqi Liu, Yan Wang, Yiming Lin, Yangbin Chen

entry.summary: Proposes RAM-SD, a retrieval-augmented multi-agent framework for sarcasm detection that operates through contextual retrieval, knowledge grounding, rhetorical pattern recognition, and deliberation stages.

entry.title: Distance-to-Distance Ratio: A Similarity Measure for Sentences Based on Rate of Change in LLM Embeddings

author.name: Abdullah Qureshi, Kenneth Rice, Alexander Wolpert

entry.summary: Introduces Distance-to-Distance Ratio (DDR), a similarity measure for sentence embeddings inspired by Lipschitz continuity that captures the rate of change between pre-context and post-context embeddings.

entry.title: CitiLink: Enhancing Municipal Transparency and Citizen Engagement through Searchable Meeting Minutes

author.name: Rodrigo Silva, Jos\'e Evans, Jos\'e Isidro, Miguel Marques, Afonso Fonseca, Ricardo Morais, Jo\~ao Canavilhas, Arian Pasquali, Purifica\c{c}\~ao Silvano, Al\'ipio Jorge, Nuno Guimar\~aes, S\'ergio Nunes, Ricardo Campos

entry.summary: Presents CitiLink platform transforming municipal meeting minutes into searchable structured data using LLMs for metadata extraction and BM25 ranking. Built over 12 years of Portuguese council data.

entry.title: To Case or Not to Case: An Empirical Study in Learned Sparse Retrieval

author.name: Emmanouil Georgios Lionis, Jia-Huei Ju, Angelos Nalmpantis, Casper Thuis, Sean MacAvaney, Andrew Yates

entry.summary: Studies impact of backbone model casing (cased vs uncased) on Learned Sparse Retrieval performance, addressing the shift to cased-only modern language models. Fills critical gap for LSR viability.

entry.title: MEGnifying Emotion: Sentiment Analysis from Annotated Brain Data

author.name: Brian Liu, Oiwi Parker Jones

entry.summary: Explores sentiment decoding from MEG brain recordings during audiobook listening, using text-to-sentiment models for annotation and force-alignment for temporal alignment. Shows improved balanced accuracy for brain-to-sentiment prediction.

entry.title: Inference-Time Loss-Guided Colour Preservation in Diffusion Sampling

author.name: Angad Singh Ahuja, Aarush Ram Anandh

entry.summary: Presents inference-time color preservation method for diffusion sampling using ROI-based inpainting, background latent re-imposition, and gradient guidance with composite Lab/RGB loss.

entry.title: SymbolSight: Minimizing Inter-Symbol Interference for Reading with Prosthetic Vision

author.name: Jasmine Lesner, Michael Beyeler

entry.summary: Proposes SymbolSight computational framework to minimize inter-symbol interference in prosthetic vision reading by optimizing symbol-to-letter mappings using simulated prosthetic vision and neural proxy observer.

entry.title: ReflexSplit: Single Image Reflection Separation via Layer Fusion-Separation

author.name: Chia-Ming Lee, Yu-Fan Lin, Jing-Hui Jung, Yu-Jou Hsiao, Chih-Chung Hsu, Yu-Lun Liu

entry.summary: Proposes ReflexSplit for single image reflection separation using Cross-scale Gated Fusion and Layer Fusion-Separation Blocks to address transmission-reflection confusion in deep decoder layers.

entry.title: Flatten The Complex: Joint B-Rep Generation via Compositional $k$-Cell Particles

author.name: Junran Lu, Yuanqi Li, Hengji Li, Jie Guo, Yanwen Guo

entry.summary: Introduces a novel paradigm for B-Rep (Boundary Representation) generation in CAD by reformulating B-Reps as sets of compositional k-cell particles, encoding topology and geometry jointly rather than in cascaded sequences.

entry.title: Video Compression with Hierarchical Temporal Neural Representation

author.name: Jun Zhu, Xinfeng Zhang, Lv Tang, Junhao Jiang, Gai Zhang, Jia Wang

entry.summary: TeNeRV proposes hierarchical temporal neural representation for video compression with inter-frame feature fusion for local temporal coherence and global aggregation modules for long-term dependencies.

entry.title: MorphXAI: An Explainable Framework for Morphological Analysis of Parasites in Blood Smear Images

author.name: Aqsa Yousaf, Sint Sint Win, Megan Coffee, Habeeb Olufowobi

entry.summary: MorphXAI provides explainable parasite detection by unifying detection with fine-grained morphological analysis, moving beyond visual heatmaps to capture clinically-relevant morphological traits.

entry.title: Text-Pass Filter: An Efficient Scene Text Detector

author.name: Chuang Yang, Haozhao Ma, Xu Han, Yuan Yuan, Qi Wang

entry.summary: Text-Pass Filter proposes band-pass filtering analogy for scene text detection, segmenting whole text regions directly while naturally separating adhesive texts without complex post-processing.

entry.title: Forward Consistency Learning with Gated Context Aggregation for Video Anomaly Detection

author.name: Jiahao Lyu, Minghua Zhao, Xuewen Huang, Yifei Chen, Shuangli Du, Jing Hu, Cheng Shi, Zhiyong Lv

entry.summary: FoGA introduces lightweight (~2M parameters) video anomaly detection with forward consistency learning and gated context aggregation, designed for edge device deployment.

entry.title: Multi-Perspective Subimage CLIP with Keyword Guidance for Remote Sensing Image-Text Retrieval

author.name: Yifan Li, Shiying Wang, Jianqiang Huang

entry.summary: MPS-CLIP shifts remote sensing image-text retrieval from global matching to keyword-guided fine-grained alignment, using LLM for keyword extraction and SamGeo for subimage generation.

entry.title: Vision-Language-Model-Guided Differentiable Ray Tracing for Fast and Accurate Multi-Material RF Parameter Estimation

author.name: Zerui Kang, Yishen Lim, Zhouyou Gu, Seung-Woo Ko, Tony Q. S. Quek, Jihong Park

entry.summary: Proposes VLM-guided framework for multi-material RF parameter estimation in differentiable ray tracing, using VLM to parse scenes for material priors and select informative transmitter/receiver placements.

entry.title: Gaze Prediction in Virtual Reality Without Eye Tracking Using Visual and Head Motion Cues

author.name: Christos Petrou, Harris Partaourides, Athanasios Balomenos, Yannis Kopsinis, Sotirios Chatzis

entry.summary: Presents gaze prediction framework for VR that combines HMD motion signals with visual saliency cues when eye tracking is unavailable due to hardware or privacy constraints.

entry.title: AI-enabled Satellite Edge Computing: A Single-Pixel Feature based Shallow Classification Model for Hyperspectral Imaging

author.name: Li Fang, Tianyu Li, Yanghong Lin, Shudong Zhou, Wei Yao

entry.summary: Proposes lightweight non-deep learning framework for hyperspectral classification on satellite edge computing, using single-pixel features for autonomous decision-making under resource constraints.

entry.title: AGSP-DSA: An Adaptive Graph Signal Processing Framework for Robust Multimodal Fusion with Dynamic Semantic Alignment

author.name: KV Karthikeya, Ashok Kumar Das, Shantanu Pal, Vivekananda Bhat K, Arun Sekar Rajasekaran

entry.summary: AGSP-DSA introduces adaptive graph signal processing framework for multimodal fusion with dual-graph construction, spectral filtering, and semantic-aware attention for text, audio, and images.

entry.title: EFSI-DETR: Efficient Frequency-Semantic Integration for Real-Time Small Object Detection in UAV Imagery

author.name: Yu Xia, Chang Liu, Tianqi Xiang, Zhigang Tu

entry.summary: EFSI-DETR addresses small object detection in UAV imagery through frequency-semantic integration with Dynamic Frequency-Spatial Unified Synergy Network for multi-scale feature enhancement.

entry.title: Systematic Characterization of Minimal Deep Learning Architectures: A Unified Analysis of Convergence, Pruning, and Quantization

author.name: Ziwei Zheng, Huizhi Liang, Vaclav Snasel, Vito Latora, Panos Pardalos, Giuseppe Nicosia, Varun Ojha

entry.summary: Presents methodology for systematically exploring relationships among convergence, pruning, and quantization across DNNs, CNNs, and Vision Transformers on image classification.

entry.title: Goal-oriented Communication for Fast and Robust Robotic Fault Detection and Recovery

author.name: Shutong Chen, Adnan Aijaz, Yansha Deng

entry.summary: Proposes goal-oriented communication framework for fast and robust robotic fault detection and recovery, jointly designing communication-computation-control loop.

entry.title: Boosting methods for interval-censored data with regression and classification

author.name: Yuan Bian, Grace Y. Yi, Wenqing He

entry.summary: Introduces nonparametric boosting methods for regression and classification with interval-censored data using censoring unbiased transformations.

entry.title: Contrasting Global and Patient-Specific Regression Models via a Neural Network Representation

author.name: Max Behrens, Daiana Stolz, Eleni Papakonstantinou, Janis M. Nolde, Gabriele Bellerino, Angelika Rohde, Moritz Hess, Harald Binder

entry.summary: Proposes diagnostic tool for contrasting global and patient-specific regression models using localized regression to identify where global models are inadequate.

entry.title: Can you just vibe vulnerabilities?

author.name: Max von Hippel

entry.summary: Explores whether AI can autonomously find real-world software vulnerabilities, noting both promising signals (DARPA AIxCC results) and skeptical signals (hackers not using AI tools, curl leaving HackerOne). Expresses cautious skepticism.

entry.title: RegGuard: AI-Powered Retrieval-Enhanced Assistant for Pharmaceutical Regulatory Compliance

author.name: Siyuan Yang, Xihan Bian, Jiayin Tang

entry.summary: Introduces RegGuard, an industrial AI assistant for pharmaceutical regulatory compliance using hierarchical semantic chunking and dense passage retrieval for heterogeneous regulatory documents.

entry.title: Embodiment-Induced Coordination Regimes in Tabular Multi-Agent Q-Learning

author.name: Muhammad Ahmed Atif, Nehal Naeem Haji, Mohammad Shahid Shaikh, Muhammad Ebad Atif

entry.summary: Shows centralized Q-learning fails to consistently outperform independent learning in multi-agent RL under controlled embodiment constraints, challenging common assumptions.

entry.title: SKETCH: Semantic Key-Point Conditioning for Long-Horizon Vessel Trajectory Prediction

author.name: Linyong Gan, Zimo Li, Wenxin Xu, Xingjian Li, Jianhua Z. Huang, Enmei Tu, Shuhang Chen

entry.summary: Proposes SKETCH framework for long-horizon vessel trajectory prediction using semantic key-point conditioning, decomposing prediction into global semantic decision-making and local motion modeling.

entry.title: Pisets: A Robust Speech Recognition System for Lectures and Interviews

author.name: Ivan Bondarenko, Daniil Grebenkin, Oleg Sedukhin, Mikhail Klementev, Roman Derunets, Lyudmila Budneva

entry.summary: Presents Pisets, a three-component Russian ASR system combining Wav2Vec2, Audio Spectrogram Transformer, and Whisper to reduce errors and hallucinations in lecture and interview transcription.

entry.title: Differentiable Architecture Search for Adversarially Robust Quantum Computer Vision

author.name: Mohamed Afane, Quanjiang Long, Haoting Shen, Ying Mao, Junaid Farooq, Ying Wang, Juntao Chen

entry.summary: Proposes hybrid quantum-classical differentiable architecture search framework for adversarially robust quantum neural networks, using a Classical Noise Layer for joint optimization.

entry.title: Hierarchical Informative Path Planning via Graph Guidance and Trajectory Optimization

author.name: Avraiem Iskandar, Shamak Dutta, Kevin Murrant, Yash Vardhan Pant, Stephen L. Smith

entry.summary: Proposes hierarchical framework for informative path planning combining graph-based global planning, segment-wise budget allocation, and spline-based refinement for Gaussian process-based sensing.

entry.title: Transfer learning for scalar-on-function regression via control variates

author.name: Yuping Yang, Zhiyang Zhou

entry.summary: Proposes control-variates method for transfer learning in scalar-on-function regression using only summary statistics, applicable in privacy-restricted settings.

entry.title: Prompt and Circumstances: Evaluating the Efficacy of Human Prompt Inference in AI-Generated Art

author.name: Khoi Trinh, Scott Seidenberger, Joseph Spracklen, Raveen Wijewickrama, Bimal Viswanath, Murtuza Jadliwala, Anindya Maiti

entry.summary: Studies whether humans and AI can infer prompts from AI-generated images, questioning intellectual property claims of prompt marketplaces.

entry.title: From Classification to Ranking: Enhancing LLM Reasoning Capabilities for MBTI Personality Detection

author.name: Yuan Cao, Feixiang Liu, Xinyue Wang, Yihan Zhu, Hui Xu, Zheng Wang, Qiang Qiu

entry.summary: Proposes ranking-based approach to MBTI personality detection from social media posts, moving from classification to pairwise comparison of personality traits.

entry.title: Automated HER2 scoring with uncertainty quantification using lensfree holography and deep learning

author.name: Che-Yung Shen, Xilin Yang, Yuzhu Li, Leon Lenk, Aydogan Ozcan

entry.summary: Presents compact lensfree holography platform with deep learning for automated HER2 scoring of breast cancer tissue, achieving ~84 mm²/minute throughput with uncertainty quantification.

entry.title: Eye-Tracking-Driven Control in Daily Task Assistance for Assistive Robotic Arms

author.name: Anke Fischer-Janzen, Thomas M. Wendt, Kristof Van Laerhoven

entry.summary: Presents eye-tracking-driven shared control framework for assistive robotic arms using task pictograms as fiducial markers combined with feature matching.

entry.title: Nonlinear multi-study factor analysis

author.name: Gemma E. Moran, Anandi Krishnan

entry.summary: Proposes nonlinear multi-study factor model for learning shared and study-specific factors from multiple datasets through shared simplex geometry.

entry.title: Semantic-Aware Task Clustering for Federated Cooperative Multi-Task Semantic Communication

author.name: Ahmad Halimi Razlighi, Pallavi Dhingra, Edgar Beck, Bho Matthiesen, Armin Dekorsy

entry.summary: Extends CMT-SemCom to distributed settings using federated learning for cooperative multi-task semantic communication across distributed users.

entry.title: Multi-Agent Learning Path Planning via LLMs

author.name: Haoxin Xu, Changyong Qi, Tong Liu, Bohao Zhang, Anna He, Bingqian Jiang, Longwei Zheng, Xiaoqing Gu

entry.summary: Proposes MALPP framework using multiple LLM-powered agents (learner analytics, path planning, reflection) collaborating via structured prompts to generate personalized learning paths in educational contexts.

entry.title: AI Agent for Reverse-Engineering Legacy Finite-Difference Code and Translating to Devito

author.name: Yinghan Hou, Zongyou Yang

entry.summary: Develops AI agent framework for reverse-engineering legacy finite difference code and translating to Devito using RAG with knowledge graphs and multi-stage workflows.

entry.title: Data-Efficient Meningioma Segmentation via Implicit Spatiotemporal Mixing and Sim2Real Semantic Injection

author.name: Yunhao Xu, Fuquan Zong, Yexuan Xing, Chulong Zhang, Guang Yang, Shilong Yang, Xiaokun Liang, Juan Yu

entry.summary: Proposes dual-augmentation framework for meningioma segmentation combining Implicit Neural Representations for spatial expansion and semantic object injection. Addresses data efficiency in medical imaging.

entry.title: MambaNet: Mamba-assisted Channel Estimation Neural Network With Attention Mechanism

author.name: Dianxin Luan, Chengsi Liang, Jie Huang, Zheng Lin, Kaitao Meng, John Thompson, Cheng-Xiang Wang

entry.summary: Proposes MambaNet combining Mamba architecture with bidirectional selective scan and self-attention for OFDM channel estimation with large subcarrier configurations.

entry.title: Benchmarking Deep Learning-Based Reconstruction Methods for Photoacoustic Computed Tomography with Clinically Relevant Synthetic Datasets

author.name: Panpan Chen, Seonyeong Park, Gangwon Jeong, Refik Mert Cam, Umberto Villa, Mark A. Anastasio

entry.summary: Proposes benchmarking framework for DL-based photoacoustic computed tomography with anatomically plausible synthetic datasets and clinically relevant evaluation strategies.

entry.title: Spatiotemporal Semantic V2X Framework for Cooperative Collision Prediction

author.name: Murat Arda Onsu, Poonam Lohan, Burak Kantarci, Aisha Syed, Matthew Andrews, Sean Kennedy

entry.summary: Proposes semantic V2X framework using V-JEPA to generate spatiotemporal embeddings for cooperative collision prediction in intelligent transportation systems.

entry.title: Retell, Reward, Repeat: Reinforcement Learning for Narrative Theory-Informed Story Generation

author.name: David Y. Liu, Xanthe Muston, Aditya Joshi, Sebastian Sequoiah-Grayson

entry.summary: Explores d-RLAIF for narrative-informed story generation using Todorov's Theory of Narrative Equilibrium. Uses LLM-as-judge for reward signals aligned with narrative principles.

entry.title: UrduLM: A Resource-Efficient Monolingual Urdu Language Model

author.name: Syed Muhammad Ali, Hammad Sajid, Zainab Haider, Ali Muhammad Asad, Haya Fatima, Abdul Samad

entry.summary: UrduLM presents a 100M-parameter monolingual Urdu LLM with custom tokenizer achieving 20-30% tokenization efficiency improvement over multilingual alternatives.

entry.title: LungCRCT: Causal Representation based Lung CT Processing for Lung Cancer Treatment

author.name: Daeyoung Kim

entry.summary: Proposes causal representation learning approach for lung CT processing to enhance lung cancer detection. Aims to address early-stage detection challenges where symptoms overlap with other respiratory diseases.

entry.title: HeterCSI: Channel-Adaptive Heterogeneous CSI Pretraining Framework for Generalized Wireless Foundation Models

author.name: Chenyu Zhang, Xinchen Lyu, Chenshan Ren, Shuhan Liu, Qimei Cui, Xiaofeng Tao

entry.summary: Proposes HeterCSI framework for channel-adaptive pretraining of wireless foundation models, addressing heterogeneity across scale and scenario dimensions in CSI processing for 6G networks.

entry.title: Co-PLNet: A Collaborative Point-Line Network for Prompt-Guided Wireframe Parsing

author.name: Chao Wang, Xuanying Li, Cheng Dai, Jinglei Feng, Yuxiang Luo, Yuqi Ouyang, Hao Qin

entry.summary: Presents Co-PLNet for wireframe parsing that collaboratively exchanges spatial cues between line and junction detection via Point-Line Prompt Encoder and Cross-Guidance Line Decoder.

entry.title: Analytic Incremental Learning For Sound Source Localization With Imbalance Rectification

author.name: Zexia Fan, Yu Chen, Qiquan Zhang, Kainan Chen, Xinyuan Qian

entry.summary: Proposes unified framework for sound source localization addressing intra-task (long-tailed DoA) and inter-task imbalance using GCC-PHAT augmentation and analytic dynamic imbalance rectifier.

entry.title: Scalable Transit Delay Prediction at City Scale: A Systematic Approach with Multi-Resolution Feature Engineering and Deep Learning

author.name: Emna Boudabbous, Mohamed Karaa, Lokman Sboui, Julio Montecinos, Omar Alam

entry.summary: Presents city-scale transit delay prediction pipeline combining multi-resolution feature engineering, dimensionality reduction, and deep learning for scalable real-time bus arrival prediction.

entry.title: Neural Multi-Speaker Voice Cloning for Nepali in Low-Resource Settings

author.name: Aayush M. Shrestha, Aditya Bajracharya, Projan Shakya, Dinesh B. Kshatri

entry.summary: Presents few-shot voice cloning system for Nepali speakers using speaker encoder with GE2E loss and Tacotron2, addressing low-resource TTS for underrepresented language.

entry.title: Low Cost, High Efficiency: LiDAR Place Recognition in Vineyards with Matryoshka Representation Learning

author.name: Judith Vilella-Cantos, Mauro Martini, Marcello Chiaberge, M\'onica Ballesta, David Valiente

entry.summary: Proposes MinkUNeXt-VINE for LiDAR place recognition in vineyard environments using Matryoshka Representation Learning, achieving state-of-the-art with sparse LiDAR inputs.

entry.title: Student Mental Health Screening via Fitbit Data Collected During the COVID-19 Pandemic

author.name: Rebecca Lopez, Avantika Shrestha, ML Tlachac, Kevin Hickey, Xingtong Guo, Shichao Liu, Elke Rundensteiner

entry.summary: Evaluates machine learning models for mental health screening (depression, anxiety, stress) using Fitbit data from students during COVID-19 pandemic, comparing different physiological modalities.

entry.title: Analyzing Neural Network Information Flow Using Differential Geometry

author.name: Shuhang Tan, Jayson Sia, Paul Bogdan, Radoslav Ivanov

entry.summary: Uses Ollivier-Ricci curvature from differential geometry to identify critical neural network connections, treating NNs as graphs. Negative curvature edges are identified as bottlenecks important for model performance.

entry.title: DANCE: Dynamic, Available, Neighbor-gated Condensation for Federated Text-Attributed Graphs

author.name: Zekai Chen, Haodong Lu, Xunkai Li, Henan Sun, Jia Li, Hongchao Qin, Rong-Hua Li, Guoren Wang

entry.summary: Proposes DANCE for federated learning on text-attributed graphs, using graph condensation to reduce LLM computation costs. Addresses overhead, suboptimality, and instability challenges in TAG-FGL.

entry.title: Understanding and Improving UMAP with Geometric and Topological Priors: The JORC-UMAP Algorithm

author.name: Xiaobin Li, Run Zhang

entry.summary: Improves UMAP by introducing Ollivier-Ricci curvature as geometric prior and Jaccard similarity as topological prior. Addresses UMAP's sensitivity to k-NN graph construction that causes topological tearing.

entry.title: Dynamic Expert-Guided Model Averaging for Causal Discovery

author.name: Adrick Tench, Thomas Demeester

entry.summary: Proposes ensemble method for causal discovery that dynamically combines multiple algorithms guided by expert knowledge. Inspired by using LLMs as expert stand-ins for causal knowledge.

entry.title: Multigrade Neural Network Approximation

author.name: Shijun Zhang, Zuowei Shen, Yuesheng Xu

entry.summary: Studies multigrade deep learning (MGDL) where deep networks are trained grade-by-grade with previously learned components frozen. Provides theoretical framework for structured error refinement.

entry.title: The Trajectory Alignment Coefficient in Two Acts: From Reward Tuning to Reward Learning

author.name: Calarina Muslimani, Yunshu Du, Kenta Kawamoto, Kaushik Subramanian, Peter Stone, Peter Wurman

entry.summary: Studies Trajectory Alignment Coefficient (TAC) for reward function specification through human study on Lunar Lander. Shows TAC helps practitioners tune rewards, but TAC alone is insufficient for identifying optimal rewards.

entry.title: Test-Time Adaptation for Speech Emotion Recognition

author.name: Jiaheng Dong, Hong Jia, Ting Dang

entry.summary: First systematic investigation of test-time adaptation for speech emotion recognition. Evaluates TTA methods designed for images/speech recognition on SER-specific domain shifts like speaker variability.

entry.title: Experience with Single Domain Generalization in Real World Medical Imaging Deployments

author.name: Ayan Banerjee, Komandoor Srivathsan, Sandeep K. S. Gupta

entry.summary: Shares practical experience with single domain generalization in real medical imaging deployments. Covers seizure detection from fMRI and stress echocardiography across different acquisition conditions.

entry.title: Tight Regret Bounds for Bilateral Trade under Semi Feedback

author.name: Yaonan Jin

entry.summary: Resolves open question on regret bounds for fixed-price bilateral trade under GBB semi-feedback. Achieves O(T^{2/3}) regret matching the known lower bound up to log factors.

entry.title: Learning to Optimize by Differentiable Programming

author.name: Liping Tao, Xindi Tong, Chee Wei Tan

entry.summary: Tutorial on using differentiable programming frameworks to learn optimization algorithms. Demonstrates how duality-informed schemes like ADMM and PDHG can be learned through end-to-end training.

entry.title: Semi-Supervised Hierarchical Open-Set Classification

author.name: Erik Wallin, Fredrik Kahl, Lars Hammarstrand

entry.summary: Extends hierarchical open-set classification to semi-supervised setting with unknown classes in unlabeled data. Proposes subtree pseudo-labels and age-gating to handle uncertainty about novel classes.

entry.title: PRISM: Purified Representation and Integrated Semantic Modeling for Generative Sequential Recommendation

author.name: Dengzhao Fang, Jingtong Gao, Yu Li, Xiangyu Zhao, Yi Chang

entry.summary: Proposes PRISM for generative sequential recommendation addressing semantic tokenization impurity and information loss. Introduces purified representation with hierarchical structure for better generation.

entry.title: Efficient Learning of Stationary Diffusions with Stein-type Discrepancies

author.name: Fabian Bleile, Sarah Lumpp, Mathias Drton

entry.summary: Introduces Stein-type KDS for learning stationary diffusions from data. Proves vanishing SKDS guarantees alignment with target distribution; shows convexity under broad parametrizations.

entry.title: A Lightweight Medical Image Classification Framework via Self-Supervised Contrastive Learning and Quantum-Enhanced Feature Modeling

author.name: Jingsong Xia, Siqi Wang

entry.summary: Proposes hybrid classical-quantum framework for medical image classification combining SimCLR self-supervised pretraining with parameterized quantum circuits for feature enhancement.

entry.title: Fast, faithful and photorealistic diffusion-based image super-resolution with enhanced Flow Map models

author.name: Maxence Noble, Gonzalo I\~naki Quintana, Benjamin Aubin, Cl\'ement Chadebec

entry.summary: Proposes enhanced Flow Map models for fast, faithful diffusion-based image super-resolution. Addresses trade-off between reconstruction faithfulness and photorealism in one-step approaches.

entry.title: ReLU Networks for Model Predictive Control: Network Complexity and Performance Guarantees

author.name: Xingchen Li, Keyou You

entry.summary: Derives explicit bounds on ReLU network complexity required to ensure MPC closed-loop performance. Establishes state-dependent Lipschitz continuity enabling sharp convergence analysis.

entry.title: Building a Robust Risk-Based Access Control System to Combat Ransomware's Capability to Encrypt: A Machine Learning Approach

author.name: Kenan Begovic, Abdulaziz Al-Ali, Qutaibah Malluhi

entry.summary: Presents a probabilistic risk-based access control system using ML to detect and block ransomware encryption in real-time on Linux. Uses kernel function traces with SELinux integration for context-sensitive permit/deny decisions.

entry.title: Fine-Grained Emotion Detection on GoEmotions: Experimental Comparison of Classical Machine Learning, BiLSTM, and Transformer Models

author.name: Ani Harutyunyan, Sachin Kumar

entry.summary: Benchmarks classical ML, BiLSTM, and BERT models on GoEmotions fine-grained emotion detection. Finds logistic regression achieves highest Micro-F1 while BERT shows best overall balance.

entry.title: Structure-Aware NL-to-SQL for SFC Provisioning via AST-Masking Empowered Language Models

author.name: Xinyu Zhu, Parisa Fard Moshiri, Poonam Lohan, Burak Kantarci, Emil Janulewicz

entry.summary: Proposes AST-Masking for natural language to SQL conversion in network service function chain provisioning, using abstract syntax trees to enforce syntactic consistency during fine-tuning.

entry.title: Synthetic Data Guided Feature Selection for Robust Activity Recognition in Older Adults

author.name: Shuhao Que, Dieuwke van Dartel, Ilse Heeringa, Han Hegeman, Miriam Vollenbroek-Hutten, Ying Wang

entry.summary: Develops robust human activity recognition for hip fracture rehabilitation using synthetic data-guided feature selection, addressing challenges with older adults' slower, variable gait patterns.

entry.title: Decoding Psychological States Through Movement: Inferring Human Kinesic Functions with Application to Built Environments

author.name: Cheyu Lin, Katherine A. Flanigan, Sirajum Munir

entry.summary: Introduces DUET dataset and kinesics recognition framework for measuring socially meaningful interaction in built environments using privacy-preserving movement analysis.

entry.title: Multi-stage Bridge Inspection System: Integrating Foundation Models with Location Anonymization

author.name: Takato Yasuno

entry.summary: Presents open-source bridge damage detection system with regional privacy protection using SAM 3 for rebar corrosion detection and DBSCAN for completion, with construction sign anonymization.

entry.title: HyDeMiC: A Deep Learning-based Mineral Classifier using Hyperspectral Data

author.name: M. L. Mamud, Piyoosh Jaysaval, Frederick D Day-Lewis, M. K. Mudunuru

entry.summary: Proposes HyDeMiC CNN for hyperspectral mineral classification robust to noisy data, trained on laboratory-measured data for 115 minerals from USGS.

entry.title: Saliency Driven Imagery Preprocessing for Efficient Compression -- Industrial Paper

author.name: Justin Downes, Sam Saltwick, Anthony Chen

entry.summary: Proposes saliency-driven preprocessing for satellite imagery compression, focusing encoding on areas of interest identified by saliency maps to optimize storage and bandwidth.

entry.title: Stylizing ViT: Anatomy-Preserving Instance Style Transfer for Domain Generalization

author.name: Sebastian Doerrich, Francesco Di Salvo, Jonas Alle, Christian Ledig

entry.summary: Proposes Stylizing ViT, a Vision Transformer that uses weight-shared attention blocks for both self- and cross-attention to enable domain generalization in medical imaging through instance-level style transfer while preserving anatomical structures.

entry.title: Learning Sewing Patterns via Latent Flow Matching of Implicit Fields

author.name: Cong Cao, Ren Li, Corentin Dumery, Hao Li

entry.summary: Presents a sewing pattern generation method using implicit representation with signed/unsigned distance fields encoded into a continuous latent space, combined with flow matching to learn distributions over panel combinations.

entry.title: DTC: A Deformable Transposed Convolution Module for Medical Image Segmentation

author.name: Chengkun Sun, Jinqian Pan, Renjie Liang, Zhengkang Fan, Xin Miao, Jiang Bian, Jie Xu

entry.summary: DTC introduces deformable transposed convolution for medical image segmentation, allowing adaptive sampling positions during upsampling to better capture structural information in UNet-like architectures.

entry.title: Strip-Fusion: Spatiotemporal Fusion for Multispectral Pedestrian Detection

author.name: Asiegbu Miracle Kanu-Asiegbu, Nitin Jotwani, Xiaoxiao Du

entry.summary: Strip-Fusion proposes spatial-temporal fusion network for multispectral pedestrian detection that is robust to misalignment between RGB and thermal images and handles varying lighting conditions.

entry.title: Cross-Domain Transfer with Self-Supervised Spectral-Spatial Modeling for Hyperspectral Image Classification

author.name: Jianshu Chao, Tianhua Lv, Qiqiong Ma, Yunfei Qiu, Li Fang, Huifang Shen, Wei Yao

entry.summary: Introduces self-supervised cross-domain transfer framework for hyperspectral classification that learns transferable spectral-spatial representations without source labels using Spatial-Spectral Transformer.

entry.title: TempDiffReg: Temporal Diffusion Model for Non-Rigid 2D-3D Vascular Registration

author.name: Zehua Liu, Shihao Zou, Jincai Huang, Yanfang Zhang, Chao Tong, Weixin Si

entry.summary: TempDiffReg proposes temporal diffusion model for non-rigid 2D-3D vascular registration in liver interventions, using coarse-to-fine strategy with structure-aware perspective n-point alignment.

entry.title: Contextual Range-View Projection for 3D LiDAR Point Clouds

author.name: Seyedali Mousavi, Seyedhamidreza Mousavi, Masoud Daneshtalab

entry.summary: Extends depth-based point selection in LiDAR range-view projection by incorporating contextual information from instance centers and class labels to address many-to-one mapping conflicts.

entry.title: REMAC: Reference-Based Martian Asymmetrical Image Compression

author.name: Qing Ding, Mai Xu, Shengxi Li, Xin Deng, Xin Zou

entry.summary: REMAC develops efficient Martian image compression exploiting strong intra- and inter-image similarities in texture, color, and structure, addressing computational constraints on Mars.

entry.title: Automated Landmark Detection for assessing hip conditions: A Cross-Modality Validation of MRI versus X-ray

author.name: Roberto Di Via, Vito Paolo Pastore, Francesca Odone, Si\^on Glyn-Jones, Irina Voiculescu

entry.summary: Conducts matched-cohort validation study comparing automated landmark detection on MRI versus X-ray for hip condition assessment, demonstrating clinical equivalence for cam-type impingement.

entry.title: Attention-Based Variational Framework for Joint and Individual Components Learning with Applications in Brain Network Analysis

author.name: Yifei Zhang, Meimei Liu, Zhengwu Zhang

entry.summary: Proposes CM-JIVNet, a variational framework for learning joint and modality-specific latent representations from paired brain connectivity data (structural and functional connectivity).

entry.title: Real-Time Synchronized Interaction Framework for Emotion-Aware Humanoid Robots

author.name: Yanrong Chen, Xihan Bian

entry.summary: Presents real-time framework for NAO robots synchronizing speech prosody with gestures using LLM-generated motion descriptors and dynamic time warping.

entry.title: Out-of-Distribution Radar Detection with Complex VAEs: Theory, Whitening, and ANMF Fusion

author.name: Yadang Alexis Rouzoumka, Jean Pinsolle, Eug\'enie Terreaux, Christ\`ele Morisseau, Jean-Philippe Ovarlez, Chengfang Ren

entry.summary: Investigates OOD detection for radar using Complex VAEs trained on clutter-plus-noise, with local whitening preprocessing and ANMF fusion.

entry.title: Covariate-assisted Grade of Membership Models via Shared Latent Geometry

author.name: Zhiyu Xu, Yuqi Gu

entry.summary: Introduces covariate-assisted grade of membership model integrating response and covariate information through shared simplex geometry with spectral estimation procedure.

entry.title: Learning Transferable Skills in Action RPGs via Directed Skill Graphs and Selective Adaptation

author.name: Ali Najar

entry.summary: Learns transferable combat skills in Dark Souls III using directed skill graphs and hierarchical curriculum, demonstrating selective adaptation when game phases change.

entry.title: Cross-Lingual Probing and Community-Grounded Analysis of Gender Bias in Low-Resource Bengali

author.name: Md Asgor Hossain Reaj, Rajan Das Gupta, Jui Saha Pritha, Abdullah Al Noman, Abir Ahmed, Golam Md Mohiuddin, Tze Hui Liew

entry.summary: Cross-lingual probing of gender bias in Bengali LLMs using multiple extraction methods including translation-based comparison and GPT-based bias generation.

entry.title: SPADE: A SIMD Posit-enabled compute engine for Accelerating DNN Efficiency

author.name: Sonu Kumar, Lavanya Vinnakota, Mukul Lokhande, Santosh Kumar Vishvakarma, Adam Teman

entry.summary: Presents SPADE, a unified multi-precision SIMD Posit-based MAC architecture supporting multiple Posit formats for energy-efficient DNN inference at the edge.

entry.title: Over-The-Air Extreme Learning Machines with XL Reception via Nonlinear Cascaded Metasurfaces

author.name: Kyriakos Stylianopoulos, Mattia Fabiani, Giulia Torcolacci, Davide Dardari, George C. Alexandropoulos

entry.summary: Presents XL-MIMO system using programmable metasurfaces as Extreme Learning Machine for over-the-air binary classification with closed-form training.

entry.title: Delay-Compensated Stiffness Estimation for Robot-Mediated Dyadic Interaction

author.name: Mingtian Du, Suhas Raghavendra Kulkarni, Bernardo Noronha, Domenico Campolo

entry.summary: Proposes delay-compensated stiffness estimation framework for robot-mediated dyadic interaction that explicitly accounts for network-induced haptic delays.

entry.title: Exact Minimum-Volume Confidence Set Intersection for Multinomial Outcomes

author.name: Heguang Lin, Binhao Chen, Mengze Li, Daniel Pimentel-Alarc\'on, Matthew L. Malloy

entry.summary: Presents certified algorithm for determining whether minimum-volume confidence sets intersect for multinomial outcomes, encoding as decision problem.

entry.title: Coding-Enforced Resilient and Secure Aggregation for Hierarchical Federated Learning

author.name: Shudi Weng, Ming Xiao, Mikael Skoglund

entry.summary: H-SecCoGC proposes coding-based secure aggregation for hierarchical federated learning, ensuring accurate aggregation under varying privacy levels.

entry.title: Entropy-Guided Agreement-Diversity: A Semi-Supervised Active Learning Framework for Fetal Head Segmentation in Ultrasound

author.name: Fangyijie Wang, Siteng Ma, Gu\'enol\'e Silvestre, Kathleen M. Curran

entry.summary: Proposes EGAD, a two-stage active learning sampler for fetal head segmentation that combines entropy-based uncertainty selection with agreement-diversity scoring.

entry.title: Constraint-Aware Discrete-Time PID Gain Optimization for Robotic Joint Control Under Actuator Saturation

author.name: Ojasva Mishra, Xiaolong Wu, Min Xu

entry.summary: Presents implementation-aware analysis and Bayesian optimization workflow for discrete-time PID control under actuator saturation with analytical stability guarantees.

entry.title: Cognitive Platform Engineering for Autonomous Cloud Operations

author.name: Vinoth Punniyamoorthy, Nitin Saksena, Srivenkateswara Reddy Sankiti, Nachiappan Chockalingam, Aswathnarayan Muthukrishnan Kirubakaran, Shiva Kumar Reddy Carimireddy, Durgaraman Maruthavanan

entry.summary: Proposes Cognitive Platform Engineering integrating AI sensing, reasoning, and autonomous action into cloud operations through a four-plane reference architecture for next-generation DevOps.

entry.title: Between Search and Platform: ChatGPT Under the DSA

author.name: Toni Lorente, Kathrin Gardhouse

entry.summary: Legal analysis arguing ChatGPT should be classified as a hybrid of online search engines and platforms under the EU Digital Services Act, requiring specific regulatory treatment.

entry.title: PC-MCL: Patient-Consistent Multi-Cycle Learning with multi-label bias correction for respiratory sound classification

author.name: Seung Gyu Jeong, Seong-Eun Kim

entry.summary: Proposes PC-MCL for respiratory sound classification addressing multi-label distributional bias through multi-cycle concatenation and patient-matching auxiliary task.

entry.title: Parameter Efficient Fine Tuning Llama 3.1 for Answering Arabic Legal Questions: A Case Study on Jordanian Laws

author.name: Mohammed Fasha, Bassam Hammo, Bilal Sowan, Husam Barham, Esam Nsour

entry.summary: Fine-tunes Llama-3.1 8B for Arabic legal QA using PEFT with LoRA adapters and 4-bit quantization. Custom dataset of 6000 legal question-answer pairs from Jordanian laws.

entry.title: DIETA: A Decoder-only transformer-based model for Italian-English machine TrAnslation

author.name: Pranav Kasela, Marco Braga, Alessandro Ghiotto, Andrea Pilzer, Marco Viviani, Alessandro Raganato

entry.summary: DIETA: 0.5B decoder-only transformer for Italian-English translation trained on 207M sentence pairs plus back-translated data, with new WikiNews evaluation set.

entry.title: Diffusion Model-based Reinforcement Learning for Version Age of Information Scheduling: Average and Tail-Risk-Sensitive Control

author.name: Haoyuan Pan, Sizhao Chen, Zhaorui Wang, Tse-Tin Chan

entry.summary: Applies diffusion model-based reinforcement learning to optimize Version Age of Information scheduling in wireless systems, addressing both average and tail-risk scenarios. Novel combination of generative models with wireless resource allocation under long-term constraints.

entry.title: Emergent Cooperation in Quantum Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning Using Communication

author.name: Michael K\"olle, Christian Reff, Leo S\"unkel, Julian Hager, Gerhard Stenzel, Claudia Linnhoff-Popien

entry.summary: Applies communication protocols (MATE, MEDIATE, Gifting, RIAL) to quantum Q-Learning agents for emergent cooperation in Sequential Social Dilemmas.

entry.title: Systematicity between Forms and Meanings across Languages Supports Efficient Communication

author.name: Doreen Osmelak, Yang Xu, Michael Hahn, Kate McCurdy

entry.summary: Examines how grammatical meanings map to word forms across languages, finding evidence for competing pressures of simplicity and accuracy. Introduces novel complexity measure based on learnability of meaning-to-form mappings.

entry.title: Corpus-Based Approaches to Igbo Diacritic Restoration

author.name: Ignatius Ezeani

entry.summary: PhD thesis presenting corpus-based approaches to diacritic restoration for Igbo, a low-resource African language. Addresses NLP resource gaps for under-served languages.

entry.title: Memento: Towards Proactive Visualization of Everyday Memories with Personal Wearable AR Assistant

author.name: Yoonsang Kim, Yalong Yang, Arie E. Kaufman

entry.summary: Introduces Memento, an AR assistant that permanently captures user queries with spatiotemporal context, discovering connections between recurring interests and proactively delivering relevant information.

entry.title: Diagnosis Support of Sickle Cell Anemia by Classifying Red Blood Cell Shape in Peripheral Blood Images

author.name: Wilkie Delgado-Font, Miriela Escobedo-Nicot, Manuel Gonz\'alez-Hidalgo, Silena Herold-Garcia, Antoni Jaume-i-Cap\'o, Arnau Mir

entry.summary: Proposes automated method for red blood cell classification in peripheral blood images using Chan-Vese segmentation for sickle cell anemia diagnosis support.

entry.title: An AI-enabled tool for quantifying overlapping red blood cell sickling dynamics in microfluidic assays

author.name: Nikhil Kadivar, Guansheng Li, Jianlu Zheng, John M. Higgins, Ming Dao, George Em Karniadakis, Mengjia Xu

entry.summary: Presents an automated deep learning framework for quantifying sickle cell populations in microscopy data, combining AI-assisted annotation, nnU-Net segmentation, and watershed algorithms to track morphological transitions in densely packed cells.

entry.title: Domain Generalization with Quantum Enhancement for Medical Image Classification: A Lightweight Approach for Cross-Center Deployment

author.name: Jingsong Xia, Siqi Wang

entry.summary: Proposes a lightweight domain generalization framework with quantum-enhanced collaborative learning for medical image classification, combining MobileNetV2 encoder with multi-domain imaging shift simulation.

entry.title: Semi-Supervised Hyperspectral Image Classification with Edge-Aware Superpixel Label Propagation and Adaptive Pseudo-Labeling

author.name: Yunfei Qiu, Qiqiong Ma, Tianhua Lv, Li Fang, Shudong Zhou, Wei Yao

entry.summary: Proposes semi-supervised hyperspectral image classification with edge-aware superpixel label propagation and adaptive pseudo-labeling to address boundary diffusion and pseudo-label instability.

entry.title: A Tumor Aware DenseNet Swin Hybrid Learning with Boosted and Hierarchical Feature Spaces for Large-Scale Brain MRI Classification

author.name: Muhammad Ali Shah (Riphah International University, Islamabad, Pakistan), Muhammad Mansoor Alam (Riphah International University, Islamabad, Pakistan, Multimedia University, Malaysia), Saddam Hussain Khan (University of Engineering and Applied Sciences, Swat, Kanju Township, Pakistan)

entry.summary: Proposes Densely Swin Hybrid framework for brain tumor MRI classification with boosted feature spaces combining DenseNet local patterns and Swin Transformer global context.

entry.title: OREHAS: A fully automated deep-learning pipeline for volumetric endolymphatic hydrops quantification in MRI

author.name: Caterina Fuster-Barcel\'o, Claudia Castrill\'on, Laura Rodrigo-Mu\~noz, Victor Manuel Vega-Su\'arez, Nicol\'as P\'erez-Fern\'andez, Gorka Bastarrika, Arrate Mu\~noz-Barrutia

entry.summary: OREHAS provides first fully automatic pipeline for volumetric endolymphatic hydrops quantification from clinical MRI, integrating slice classification, localization, and sequence-specific segmentation.

entry.title: Generative Diffusion Augmentation with Quantum-Enhanced Discrimination for Medical Image Diagnosis

author.name: Jingsong Xia, Siqi Wang

entry.summary: SDA-QEC combines simplified diffusion-based augmentation with quantum-enhanced classification for medical image diagnosis, addressing class imbalance in datasets like pneumonia detection.

entry.title: CONQUER: Context-Aware Representation with Query Enhancement for Text-Based Person Search

author.name: Zequn Xie

entry.summary: Introduces CONQUER, a two-stage framework for text-based person search that improves cross-modal alignment using optimal transport and a plug-and-play query enhancement module at inference time.

entry.title: Quest2ROS2: A ROS 2 Framework for Bi-manual VR Teleoperation

author.name: Jialong Li, Zhenguo Wang, Tianci Wang, Maj Stenmark, Volker Krueger

entry.summary: Presents Quest2ROS2, open-source ROS2 framework for bi-manual VR teleoperation with relative motion-based control overcoming workspace limitations.

entry.title: MV-S2V: Multi-View Subject-Consistent Video Generation

author.name: Ziyang Song, Xinyu Gong, Bangya Liu, Zelin Zhao

entry.summary: MV-S2V addresses multi-view subject-to-video generation with synthetic data pipeline and real-world captured dataset for 3D-consistent subject control.

entry.title: An Unsupervised Tensor-Based Domain Alignment

author.name: Chong Hyun Lee, Kibae Lee, Hyun Hee Yim

entry.summary: Proposes tensor-based domain alignment algorithm using alignment matrices on oblique manifold with regularization to preserve variance of source and target tensors.

entry.title: Intelligence Requires Grounding But Not Embodiment

author.name: Marcus Ma, Shrikanth Narayanan

entry.summary: Argues philosophically that intelligence requires grounding (connection to meaning) but not necessarily physical embodiment, proposing four properties of intelligence achievable by non-embodied grounded agents.

entry.title: Summary of the Unusual Activity Recognition Challenge for Developmental Disability Support

author.name: Christina Garcia, Nhat Tan Le, Taihei Fujioka, Umang Dobhal, Milyun Ni'ma Shoumi, Thanh Nha Nguyen, Sozo Inoue

entry.summary: Overview of challenge for recognizing unusual behaviors from pose estimation data in facilities for individuals with developmental disabilities using Leave-One-Subject-Out evaluation.

entry.title: Dynamic Meta-Ensemble Framework for Efficient and Accurate Deep Learning in Plant Leaf Disease Detection on Resource-Constrained Edge Devices

author.name: Weloday Fikadu Moges, Jianmei Su, Amin Waqas

entry.summary: Introduces Dynamic Meta-Ensemble Framework combining MobileNetV2, NASNetMobile, and InceptionV3 with adaptive weighting for plant disease detection on edge devices.

entry.title: BrainDistill: Implantable Motor Decoding with Task-Specific Knowledge Distillation

author.name: Yuhan Xie, Jinhan Liu, Xiaoyong Ni, Fei Tan, Icare Sakr, Thibault Collin, Shiqi Sun, Alejandro Rodriguez Guajardo, Demon Fanny, Charles-francois Vincent Latchoumane, Henri Lorach, Jocelyne Bloch, Gregoire Courtine, Mahsa Shoaran

entry.summary: BrainDistill uses task-specific knowledge distillation for implantable BCIs, prioritizing decoding-critical features for power-constrained deployment.

entry.title: Generative AI in Saudi Arabia: A National Survey of Adoption, Risks, and Public Perceptions

author.name: Abdulaziz AlDakheel, Ali Alshehre, Esraa Alamoudi, Moslim AlKhabbaz, Ahmed Aljohani, Raed Alharbi

entry.summary: Nationwide survey of 330 participants examining generative AI adoption, risks, and perceptions in Saudi Arabia. Finds 93% actively use GenAI primarily for text tasks with limited advanced usage.

entry.title: Reasoning-Enhanced Rare-Event Prediction with Balanced Outcome Correction

author.name: Vitaly Bulgakov, Alexander Turchin

entry.summary: Introduces LPCORP, a two-stage framework for rare-event prediction combining reasoning-enhanced prediction with confidence-based outcome correction. Uses logistic regression to correct prevalence-driven bias in predictions.

entry.title: Bayesian Experimental Design for Model Discrepancy Calibration: A Rivalry between Kullback--Leibler Divergence and Wasserstein Distance

author.name: Huchen Yang, Xinghao Dong, Jin-Long Wu

entry.summary: Compares KL divergence vs Wasserstein distance as utility functions for Bayesian experimental design. Identifies an issue with Wasserstein distance where its value depends on posterior shape rather than just location.

entry.title: Process-Tensor Tomography of SGD: Measuring Non-Markovian Memory via Back-Flow of Distinguishability

author.name: Vasileios Sevetlidis, George Pavlidis

entry.summary: Proposes viewing neural network training as a 'process tensor' and introduces back-flow of distinguishability as a witness of training memory. Demonstrates non-Markovianity in SGD training dynamics.

entry.title: Dual-Prototype Disentanglement: A Context-Aware Enhancement Framework for Time Series Forecasting

author.name: Haonan Yang, Jianchao Tang, Zhuo Li

entry.summary: Proposes DPAD, a model-agnostic framework for time series forecasting that disentangles and leverages complex temporal patterns. Uses dual-prototype bank with common and distinctive components.

entry.title: Uncertainty propagation through trained multi-layer perceptrons: Exact analytical results

author.name: Andrew Thompson, Miles McCrory

entry.summary: Provides exact analytical expressions for mean and variance of MLP output when input is multivariate Gaussian. Works for single hidden layer with ReLU activations without series expansion.

entry.title: Calibrated Similarity for Reliable Geometric Analysis of Embedding Spaces

author.name: Nicolas Tacheny

entry.summary: Uses isotonic regression to calibrate cosine similarity in embedding spaces to human judgments. Achieves near-perfect calibration while preserving rank correlation and local stability.

entry.title: Group-realizable multi-group learning by minimizing empirical risk

author.name: Navid Ardeshir, Samuel Deng, Daniel Hsu, Jingwen Liu

entry.summary: Shows sample complexity of multi-group learning improves in group-realizable setting with ERM. Also proves implementing this is computationally intractable when group class has infinite VC dimension.

entry.title: Distributional Computational Graphs: Error Bounds

author.name: Olof Hallqvist Elias, Michael Selby, Phillip Stanley-Marbell

entry.summary: Establishes non-asymptotic Wasserstein-1 error bounds for distributional computational graphs where inputs are probability distributions. Applies to empirical distributions and finite approximations.

entry.title: Perfect Clustering for Sparse Directed Stochastic Block Models

author.name: Behzad Aalipur, Yichen Qin

entry.summary: Proposes non-spectral method for community detection in sparse directed stochastic block models. Uses neighborhood-smoothing followed by K-means, working when number of communities grows.

entry.title: Neurocomputational Mechanisms of Syntactic Transfer in Bilingual Sentence Production

author.name: Ahmet Yavuz Uluslu, Elliot Murphy

entry.summary: Discusses incorporating oscillatory neural signatures into study of bilingual production errors, proposing ROSE model can account for syntactic transfer and cross-linguistic influence.

entry.title: Hybrid Deep Feature Extraction and ML for Construction and Demolition Debris Classification

author.name: Obai Alashram, Nejad Alagha, Mahmoud AlKakuri, Zeeshan Swaveel, Abigail Copiaco

entry.summary: Presents hybrid pipeline using deep feature extraction (Xception) with classical ML classifiers for construction debris classification on novel UAE dataset of 1,800 images across 4 material categories.

entry.title: GlassesGB: Controllable 2D GAN-Based Eyewear Personalization for 3D Gaussian Blendshapes Head Avatars

author.name: Rui-Yang Ju, Jen-Shiun Chiang

entry.summary: Proposes GlassesGB framework for customizable eyewear generation on 3D head avatars, bridging 2D GAN-based eyewear design with 3D Gaussian Blendshapes head reconstruction.

entry.title: Quantifying Ergonomics in the Elevate Soft Robotic Suit

author.name: Peter Bryan, Rejin John Varghese, Dario Farina

entry.summary: Presents quantitative evaluation of ergonomics and comfort for the Elevate cable-driven soft robotic suit for shoulder elevation assistance.

entry.title: Uni-RS: A Spatially Faithful Unified Understanding and Generation Model for Remote Sensing

author.name: Weiyu Zhang, Yuan Hu, Yong Li, Yu Liu

entry.summary: Uni-RS addresses spatial asymmetry in remote sensing multimodal models through explicit spatial-layout planning and spatial-aware query injection.

entry.title: Private Accountability in the Age of Artificial Intelligence

author.name: Sonia Katyal

entry.summary: Legal/academic analysis exploring conflicts between AI and civil rights protection, arguing for focus on technology-property-civil rights interactions rather than algorithmic accountability alone.

entry.title: Arabic Sign Language Recognition using Multimodal Approach

author.name: Ghadeer Alanazi, Abir Benabid

entry.summary: Investigates multimodal approach combining Leap Motion and RGB camera data for Arabic Sign Language recognition using custom dense neural networks with dropout and L2 regularization.

entry.title: LoD Sketch Extraction from Architectural Models Using Generative AI: Dataset Construction for Multi-Level Architectural Design Generation

author.name: Xusheng Du, Athiwat Kongkaeo, Ye Zhang, Haoran Xie

entry.summary: Proposes automatic LoD sketch extraction framework using generative AI for multi-level architectural design, addressing lack of paired training data for LoD modeling.

entry.title: Federated Proximal Optimization for Privacy-Preserving Heart Disease Prediction: A Controlled Simulation Study on Non-IID Clinical Data

author.name: Farzam Asad, Junaid Saif Khan, Maria Tariq, Sundus Munir, Muhammad Adnan Khan

entry.summary: Simulation study of FedProx for heart disease prediction on non-IID clinical data using UCI Heart Disease dataset. Addresses privacy constraints in healthcare.

entry.title: Feature-Space Generative Models for One-Shot Class-Incremental Learning

author.name: Jack Foster, Kirill Paramonov, Mete Ozay, Umberto Michieli

entry.summary: Uses feature-space generative models for one-shot class-incremental learning by mapping embeddings to residual space and learning prototypes.

entry.title: Design Techniques for LLM-Powered Interactive Storytelling: A Case Study of the Dramamancer System

author.name: Tiffany Wang, Yuqian Sun, Yi Wang, Melissa Roemmele, John Joon Young Chung, Max Kreminski

entry.summary: Extended abstract outlining design techniques for LLM-powered interactive storytelling in Dramamancer system, bridging authorial intent and player agency through story schemas.

entry.title: Hylog: A Hybrid Approach to Logging Text Production in Non-alphabetic Scripts

author.name: Roberto Crotti, Giovanni Denaro, Zhiqiang Du, Ricardo Mu\~noz Mart\'in

entry.summary: Presents Hylog, a hybrid logging system combining analytical keylogging with ecological text logging to capture Input Method Editor transformations for non-alphabetic scripts like Chinese.

entry.title: Designing large language model prompts to extract scores from messy text: A shared dataset and challenge

author.name: Mike Thelwall

entry.summary: Introduces dataset and challenge for designing LLM prompts to extract research quality scores from messy text, providing benchmark for NLP extraction tasks.

entry.title: Quran-MD: A Fine-Grained Multilingual Multimodal Dataset of the Quran

author.name: Muhammad Umar Salman, Mohammad Areeb Qazi, Mohammed Talha Alam

entry.summary: Presents Quran-MD, a comprehensive multimodal dataset integrating textual, linguistic, and audio dimensions of the Quran at verse and word levels, including recordings from 32 reciters.

entry.title: Revisiting Aerial Scene Classification on the AID Benchmark

author.name: Subhajeet Das, Susmita Ghosh, Abhiroop Chatterjee

entry.summary: Surveys aerial scene classification methods from handcrafted features to deep hybrid networks, and proposes Aerial-Y-Net with spatial attention and multi-scale feature fusion.

entry.title: Comparative Evaluation of Machine Learning Algorithms for Affective State Recognition from Children's Drawings

author.name: Aura Loredana Dan

entry.summary: Compares deep learning architectures (MobileNet, EfficientNet, VGG16) for affective state recognition from children's drawings for autism assessment.

entry.title: ME-WARD: A multimodal ergonomic analysis tool for musculoskeletal risk assessment from inertial and video data in working plac

author.name: Javier Gonz\'alez-Alonso, Paula Mart\'in-Tapia, David Gonz\'alez-Ortega, M\'iriam Ant\'on-Rodr\'iguez, Francisco Javier D\'iaz-Pernas, Mario Mart\'inez-Zarzuela

entry.summary: Presents ME-WARD, a multimodal ergonomic assessment tool implementing RULA methodology using IMU-based motion capture and deep learning pose tracking.

entry.title: No silver bullet: Lessons about how to create safety from the history of fire

author.name: jasoncrawford

entry.summary: Historical analysis of fire safety development arguing that safety is achieved through 'defense in depth' and multiple coordinated solutions, not silver bullets. Uses this as an analogy for thinking about AI safety approaches.

entry.title: Futarchy is Parasitic on What It Tries to Govern

author.name: Nicolas Rasmont

entry.summary: Argues futarchy (governance by prediction markets) fails structurally because conditional decision markets cannot estimate causal policy effects once acted upon. Traders price welfare conditional on approval rather than caused by approval.

entry.title: Credit Fairness: Online Fairness In Shared Resource Pools

author.name: Seyed Majid Zahedi, Rupert Freeman

entry.summary: Credit Fairness addresses online fairness in shared resource allocation, showing max-min mechanism leads to large disparities over time.

entry.title: Autonomous Mars Rover Module for Soil Sampling and Life Component Analysis

author.name: Bibek Adhikari, Rishab Rijal, Rakesh Yadav, Nikchey Khatri, Sandesh Dhakal

entry.summary: Proposes autonomous Mars rover module for soil sampling and biochemical testing using multidisciplinary integration of mechanical and vision systems.

entry.title: Grammar-Aware Literate Generative Mathematical Programming with Compiler-in-the-Loop

author.name: Roberto Rossi, Steven D. Prestwich

entry.summary: SyntAGM translates natural language to PyOPL mathematical models via generate-compile-assess-revise loop with grammar awareness.

entry.title: HyCARD-Net: A Synergistic Hybrid Intelligence Framework for Cardiovascular Disease Diagnosis

author.name: Rajan Das Gupta, Xiaobin Wu, Xun Liu, Jiaqi He

entry.summary: Proposes HyCARD-Net combining CNNs, LSTMs with KNN and XGBoost via ensemble voting for cardiovascular disease diagnosis, achieving high accuracy on benchmark datasets.

entry.title: Investigating Self-regulated Learning Sequences within a Generative AI-based Intelligent Tutoring System

author.name: Jie Gao, Shasha Li, Jianhua Zhang, Shan Li, Tingting Wang

entry.summary: Studies self-regulated learning patterns in GenAI-assisted tutoring systems by analyzing student interaction traces and information processing behaviors. Uses sequential and clustering analysis to identify learning patterns.

entry.title: AI-based System for Transforming text and sound to Educational Videos

author.name: M. E. ElAlami, S. M. Khater, M. El. R. Rehan

entry.summary: Proposes a GAN-based system for converting text or speech inputs into educational videos through three phases: transcription, keyword extraction, and frame-by-frame video generation.

entry.title: SiMiC: Context-Aware Silicon Microstructure Characterization Using Attention-Based Convolutional Neural Networks for Field-Emission Tip Analysis

author.name: Jing Jie Tan, Rupert Schreiner, Matthias Hausladen, Ali Asgharzade, Simon Edler, Julian Bartsch, Michael Bachmann, Andreas Schels, Ban-Hoe Kwan, Danny Wee-Kiat Ng, Yan-Chai Hum

entry.summary: Proposes SiMiC, an attention-based CNN for characterizing silicon microstructures from SEM images, automatically extracting morphological features like size, shape, and apex curvature.

entry.title: Trademark Search, Artificial Intelligence and the Role of the Private Sector

author.name: Sonia Katyal, Aniket Kesari

entry.summary: Examines AI's role in trademark search and similarity analysis, highlighting implications for lawyers and scholars as AI transforms intellectual property practices.

entry.title: CUROCKET: Optimizing ROCKET for GPU

author.name: Ole St\"uven, Keno Moenck, Thorsten Sch\"uppstuhl

entry.summary: Optimizes ROCKET time series classification algorithm for GPU execution with CuPy implementation. Enables convolution acceleration on GPU hardware.

entry.title: FinMetaMind: A Tech Blueprint on NLQ Systems for Financial Knowledge Search

author.name: Lalit Pant, Shivang Nagar

entry.summary: Technical blueprint for NLQ system for financial knowledge search addressing relevance ranking, data freshness, and entity recognition using NLP and vector data models.

entry.title: Do readers prefer AI-generated Italian short stories?

author.name: Michael Farrell

entry.summary: User study investigating reader preferences for AI-generated Italian short stories vs human author. Found AI texts received slightly higher ratings but no significant demographic associations.

entry.title: FedCCA: Client-Centric Adaptation against Data Heterogeneity in Federated Learning on IoT Devices

author.name: Kaile Wang, Jiannong Cao, Yu Yang, Xiaoyin Li, Yinfeng Cao

entry.summary: FedCCA addresses data heterogeneity in federated learning on IoT through client-centric adaptation extracting client-specific knowledge.

entry.title: From Fuzzy to Exact: The Halo Architecture for Infinite-Depth Reasoning via Rational Arithmetic

author.name: Hansheng Ren

entry.summary: Proposes 'Exactness Hypothesis' claiming AGI requires arbitrary precision arithmetic, and introduces Halo Architecture using rational arithmetic to address LLM hallucinations attributed to floating-point errors.

entry.title: Efficient Gaussian process learning via subspace projections

author.name: Felipe Tobar, Elsa Cazelles

entry.summary: Proposes 'projected likelihood' for Gaussian Process training using lower-dimensional data projections, providing closed-form expressions for information loss. Shows improvements over exact GP training and variational sparse GPs in accuracy and computational efficiency.

entry.title: kNN-Graph: An adaptive graph model for $k$-nearest neighbors

author.name: Jiaye Li, Gang Chen, Hang Xu, Shichao Zhang

entry.summary: Proposes adaptive graph model for k-nearest neighbors that integrates HNSW graphs with pre-computed voting. Decouples inference latency from computational complexity by shifting neighbor selection to preprocessing.

entry.title: A Collision-Free Hot-Tier Extension for Engram-Style Conditional Memory: A Controlled Study of Training Dynamics

author.name: Tao Lin

entry.summary: Investigates whether high-frequency key collisions bottleneck Engram-style conditional memory. Introduces collision-free hot-tier extension but finds it doesn't consistently improve validation loss.

entry.title: Predicting Startup Success Using Large Language Models: A Novel In-Context Learning Approach

author.name: Abdurahman Maarouf, Alket Bakiaj, Stefan Feuerriegel

entry.summary: Uses in-context learning with LLMs for startup success prediction without model training. Proposes k-NN based example selection for demonstrations when labeled data is scarce.

entry.title: Integrating Meteorological and Operational Data: A Novel Approach to Understanding Railway Delays in Finland

author.name: Vinicius Pozzobon Borin, Jean Michel de Souza Sant'Ana, Usama Raheel, Nurul Huda Mahmood

entry.summary: Presents first public dataset combining Finnish railway operations with synchronized meteorological observations 2018-2024. Integrates data from 209 weather stations with 28 engineered features.

entry.title: Sample-wise Constrained Learning via a Sequential Penalty Approach with Applications in Image Processing

author.name: Francesca Lanzillotta, Chiara Albisani, Davide Pucci, Daniele Baracchi, Alessandro Piva, Matteo Lapucci

entry.summary: Shows sample-wise constraints in learning should be enforced via sequential penalty methods rather than arbitrary penalties. Proves convergence guarantees and demonstrates viability in image processing.

entry.title: Calibrated Probabilistic Interpolation for GEDI Biomass

author.name: Robin Young, Srinivasan Keshav

entry.summary: Uses Attentive Neural Processes for interpolating sparse GEDI LiDAR observations for biomass mapping. Shows RF and XGBoost fail to produce calibrated prediction intervals; ANPs provide calibrated uncertainty.

entry.title: Latent Diffusion for Internet of Things Attack Data Generation in Intrusion Detection

author.name: Estela S\'anchez-Carballo, Francisco M. Melgarejo-Meseguer, Jos\'e Luis Rojo-\'Alvarez

entry.summary: Proposes Latent Diffusion Model for IoT intrusion detection data augmentation. Addresses class imbalance between benign and attack traffic in ML-based intrusion detection systems.

entry.title: Active learning for photonics

author.name: Ryan Lopez, Charlotte Loh, Rumen Dangovski, Marin Solja\v{c}i\'c

entry.summary: Uses analytic last-layer Bayesian neural networks for active learning in photonic crystal band gap prediction. Achieves 2.6x reduction in required training data through uncertainty-driven sample selection.

entry.title: Kernel smoothing on manifolds

entry.title: Research Summary: January 26, 2026

author.name: AATF AI News Aggregator

entry.summary:
Today's research features a major open-source release and critical safety findings. LongCat-Flash-Thinking-2601, a 560B MoE reasoning model, achieves SOTA among open-source models for agentic tasks. VibeTensor demonstrates LLM agents can generate complete deep learning system software stacks including CUDA runtime.

  • Endless Terminals (Stanford/UW) introduces autonomous pipeline for generating terminal RL environments, addressing a key bottleneck for self-improving agents
  • PHISH framework reveals persona jailbreaking via adversarial conversation history, bypassing input-only safety filters
  • Timely Machine reframes test-time scaling as wall-clock time, finding smaller models often outperform larger ones under time constraints

Theoretical and interpretability advances include floating-point transformer expressivity analysis proving non-equivariant function representation without positional encoding. Sycophancy signals are shown to be linearly separable in middle-layer attention heads, enabling targeted steering. A conceptual critique of machine unlearning argues dual-use capabilities and compositional generalization fundamentally prevent knowledge removal—an important insight for AI safety policy.
